page.description: The WIN_1394_INFO() function returns information about the 1394 (Firewire) controller on a computer.

argument.name: win_1394_info
argument.description: A pointer variable containing information about the 1394 (Firewire) controller of a computer.

argument.name: computer
argument.description: Optional. Default = "." (local computer). The name of the computer to analyze.

section.title: Example
section.description: In this example the local computer has no Firewire controller.
In this example the local computer has a Firewire controller.
